activities: Jive Software provides a social business software platform that enables communication and collaboration across an online community that supports and enhances knowledge sharing, facilitates communication within and across organizational boundaries, and enables individuals to work together to achieve common business goals.  While accessing the Jive platform, customers or users may provide personal information.  Certain personal information of such customers and users may be transferred to the United States. As part of its internal corporate operations, Jive Software transfers limited HR data relating to its employees within the EU to the United States under the relevant model clauses.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: (1) private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms (TRUSTe) for user issues and (2) EU and Swiss data protection authorities for HR data.
